title: AI Tarot Reading
subtitle: Divine Guidance for Inner Clarity
description: Tarot is a powerful tool for organizing your inner thoughts. By examining your concerns through the symbolic perspectives of each card, you can gain fresh insights and organize your inner world in ways you haven't before.
profileUpdateMessage: Please update your nickname from the profile page.

question.placeholder: Tell us what's on your mind...

cards.click: Click on the cards to reveal them
cards.all: Once all cards are revealed, AI will automatically provide detailed reading

auth.signUpSuccess: Confirmation email sent. Please click the link in the email to complete registration.
auth.authDisabled: Authentication is disabled. Please check environment variables.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Instructions
dataDeletion.subtitle: How to delete data saved through Facebook Login

howToDelete.title: How to Delete Your Data
steps: After logging in, open the profile menu in the top right corner
Click the 'Delete Account' button at the bottom of the page
All your data will be immediately deleted

timeline.title: Deletion Timeline
timeline.description: When you execute account deletion, all data will be immediately removed. Please note that data cannot be recovered after deletion.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about data deletion, please contact us at the email address below.
